tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
The linear model is induced using the accelerated stochastic gradient descent technique by LÃ©on Bottou and Yann LeCun. When the target information is 0, a self-training algorithm is used to impute a positive or negative class to the unsupervised instances. If the target information is imbalanced a minority class resampling technique is used to rebalance the training set.
This tool is part of the EDeN (Explicit Decomposition with Neighborhoods) suite, developed by Fabrizio Costa.
